metadata.name: Potential Remote Desktop Connection to Non-Domain Host
metadata.comment: Detects logons using NTLM to hosts that are potentially not part of the domain.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (metadata.event_code = 8001 AND startswith(lower(file.name), lower('termsrv')))

output.summary: Detects logons using NTLM to hosts that are potentially not part of the domain.

metadata.objective: Examine fields: Computer, UserName, DomainName, file.name False positives: 1. Host connections to valid domains, exclude these. 2. Host connections not using host FQDN. 3. Host connections to external legitimate domains. Reference: n/a
